pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Aggressive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Red Ant Nests.$(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Teleport to $(6)Mining Paradise$().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() Red Ants do not drop anything. But since they hurt you. Feel free to murder!

pages.title: Description
pages.text: The Red Ant is a small creature that spreads hatred wherever it walks. Due to the anger of the creature, Red Ants contain the energy to transport whoever interacts with them to a place where you can mine for what seems like an eternity in a prehistoric paradise. Red ants are naturally aggressive in nature. So, if you find one. Itâ€™ll most likely bite you.
